#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef map<int,int> mymap;
int main()
{
	mymap mp;
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	cin.tie(NULL);
	int n,num,t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	cin>>n;
	int input[n+1],diff[n+1];
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	cin>>input[i];
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		cin>>num;
		mp[num]=i;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		num=mp[input[i]];
		diff[i]=i-num;                   //left movement +ve, right movement -ve
	}
	int c=0;
	while(true)
	{
		int m=numeric_limits<int>::min(),pos=0;
		int val=m;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(abs(diff[i])>=m)
			{
				m=abs(diff[i]);
				val=diff[i];
				pos=i;
			}
		}
		if(val==0)
		break;
		c++;
		if(val>0)           //left movement
		{
		    diff[pos]--;
		    diff[pos-1]++;
		    swap(diff[pos],diff[pos-1]);
	    } 
	    else                //right movement
	    {
	        diff[pos]++;
		    diff[pos+1]--;
		    swap(diff[pos],diff[pos+1]);
		}
    }
    cout<<c<<endl;
}
}
